jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in full-stack development and cloud technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and TypeScript

jobs.title: Product Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Looking for a Product Marketing Manager to drive our go-to-market strategy and product launches.
requirements: Experience with market research and analysis
Track record of successful product launches

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description: Join our design team to create intuitive and engaging user experiences for our products.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma and design tools
Experience with user research and testing
